named-query.name: ReportingCollectKeyInfo.findByMonitorId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectKeyInfo a WHERE a.id.monitorId = :monitorId AND a.id.facilityid = :facilityid ORDER BY a.id.displayName

named-query.name: ReportingCollectKeyInfo.findFacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a.id.facilityid FROM CollectKeyInfo a WHERE a.collectorid = :collectorid

named-query.name: ReportingJobSessionJobEntity.findByParentJobunitId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a WHERE a.parentJobunitId = :parentJobunitId AND ((a.startDate >= :fromTime AND a.startDate < :toTime) OR (a.endDate >= :fromTime AND a.endDate < :toTime)) ORDER BY a.startDate

named-query.name: ReportingFacilityInfo.findByPkAndFafcilityType
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM FacilityInfo a WHERE a.facilityId = :facilityId AND a.facilityType = :facilityType

named-query.name: ReportingCollectKeyInfo.findByMonitorIdAndFacilityidList
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectKeyInfo a WHERE a.id.monitorId = :monitorId AND a.id.facilityid IN :facilityidList ORDER BY a.id.monitorId, a.id.itemName, a.id.displayName

named-query.name: ReportingCollectorItemCodeMstEntity.findByItemCodeList
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectorItemCodeMstEntity a WHERE a.itemCode IN :itemCodeList ORDER BY a.itemCode

named-query.name: ReportingJmxCheckInfo.getMonitorJmxInfoByMonitorIdAndMasterId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JmxCheckInfo a WHERE a.monitorId = :monitorId AND a.masterId = :masterId

named-query.name: ReportingJobSessionJobEntity.findByMaxTime
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a WHERE (a.endDate - a.startDate) = :maxTime AND a.id.jobunitId = :jobunitId AND a.id.jobId = :jobId
